description: ff. 56. 184 x 140;124 x 90 mm. 15 lin. Dhū al-Qaʻdah 837. His second gloss on al-Nawawīʼs Taṣḥīḥ, composed after the Tanqīḥ, cf. ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, col. 492; Brockelmann, GAL, S I, 670 (II, commentary 3, gloss a). Incip.: ... الحمد لله ... وبعد فان تصحىح التنبىه .. لما تأملته وجدته لکبىر من التصحىحات
author: Isnawī, ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-ḥasan, 1305-1370
title: Tadhkirat al-nabīh fī Taṣḥīḥ al-Tanbīh.
creator: Isnawī, ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-ḥasan, 1305-1370
subject: Nawawī, 1233-1277—Taṣḥīḥ al-Tanbīh.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
